TypeSignature.Value: public class RadioButtonList : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl, System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RadioButtonList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser
Public Class RadioButtonList Inherits ListControl Implements INamingContainer, IPostBackDataHandler, IRepeatInfoUser
public ref class RadioButtonList : System::Web::UI::WebControls::ListControl, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::IPostBackDataHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IRepeatInfoUser
type RadioButtonList = class inherit ListControl interface IRepeatInfoUser interface INamingContainer interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 表示封装一组单选按钮控件的列表控件。

span.span: Represents a list control that encapsulates a group of radio button controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [指定列表布局Specifying List Layout](#specifying_list_layout) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件提供了页面开发人员可以动态生成通过数据绑定的单项选择单选按钮组。The control provides page developers with a single-selection radio button group that can be dynamically generated through data binding. 它包含包含对应于列表上的单个项的成员集合。It contains an collection with members that correspond to individual items on the list. 若要确定选择哪一项，测试列表的属性。To determine which item is selected, test the property of the list. ## 指定列表布局Specifying List Layout 您可以指定如何通过设置呈现列表和属性。You can specify how the list is rendered by setting the and properties. 有关布局选项的信息，请参阅枚举。For information about layout options, see the enumeration. 默认情况下， 设置为 `RepeatDirection.Vertical`。By default, is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`. 此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`会导致控件水平呈现列表。Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` causes the control to render the list horizontally. 某些设置不允许水平布局。Some settings do not allow horizontal layout. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 可以使用验证控件以显示中的输入的文本之前验证用户输入控件。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本攻击在 Web 应用程序通过应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式修改的显示控件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically modify the display of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表格单元格的边框和内容之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.

value.span: 表格单元格的边框和内容之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between the border and the contents of the table cell.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为 `RepeatLayout.Table` 时才应用此属性。This property applies only when the property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`. 使用此属性来控制的单元格内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell. 它使用表中最高的单元格的高度和表中最宽的单元格的宽度。It uses the height of the tallest cell in the table and the width of the widest cell in the table. 所生成的单元格大小统一应用于表中的所有单元格。The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the table. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来填充的单元格使用 10 个像素的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad the cells of a control with 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellPadding Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置相邻表格单元格之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.

value.span: 相邻表格单元格之间的距离(以像素为单位)。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between adjacent table cells.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 属性设置为 `RepeatLayout.Table` 时才应用此属性。This property applies only when the property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`. 使用此属性来控制表中的各个单元格之间的间距。Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the table. 水平和垂直方向，才应用此属性。This property is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以便的单元格10 个像素相隔的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to space the cells of a control apart by 10 pixels. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.CellSpacing Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法指示是否的状态控制已更改。The method indicates whether the state of the control has changed. 换而言之，它确定在控件中选定的列表项是否与上次发布的值相同。In other words, it determines whether the selected list item in the control is the same as the last posted value. 更改控制更改中的选定的项的用户值控件。A user changing the selected item in the control changes the value for the control. 如果在控件中，选择相同的列表项，或如果控件处于禁用状态，返回`false`。If the same list item is selected in the control, or if the control is disabled, returns `false`. 当方法将返回`true`控件，ASP.NET 页面框架调用控件方法。When the method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the method for the control.

summary.span: 通知 ASP.NET 应用程序 控件的状态已更改。

span.span: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。The method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. ASP.NET 页面框架调用方法控制何时方法指示列表项的状态已更改在控件。The ASP.NET page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the control. 方法调用方法来引发事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控件开发人员可以重写方法来执行自定义处理，当用户更改控件中选定的项。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user changes the selected item in the control. `RaisePostBackEvent`方法可以选择执行引发之前验证控件事件。The `RaisePostBackEvent` method can optionally perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要验证的一组在页上时中的列表项控件控件处于选中状态，设置和属性设置为`true`，然后指定的控件中要验证组属性.To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the control is selected, set the and properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to be validated in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法实现控制初始化的对象列表中，并调用方法，后者又使用方法以呈现单个单选按钮列表项。The method implementation for a control initializes a object for the list, and calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual radio button list items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中的自定义服务器控件的方法，以便控件始终显示为带有说明性文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the control is always displayed with descriptive text. summary.span: 呈现 控件中的列表项。

span.span: Renders a list item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员在自定义控件派生自类。This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the class. 方法实现控制初始化的对象列表中，并调用方法，后者又使用方法以呈现列表项的单个单选按钮。The method implementation for a control initializes a object for the list, and calls the method, which in turn uses the method to render individual radio-button list items. 方法控件将忽略`itemType`和`repeatInfo`参数。The method for a control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters. `repeatIndex`参数值用于单选按钮列表中选择项集合和所选的列表项呈现到输出流。The `repeatIndex` parameter value is used to select the radio button list item in the collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的列数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 中显示的列数。

span.span: The number of columns to display in the .

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，可以使用此属性指定的显示中的项的列数控件。When the property is set to , you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the control. 如果未设置此属性，控件中单个列的列表中显示的所有项。If this property is not set, the control displays all items in the list in a single column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示的项两列中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the items of a control in two columns. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatColumns Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of columns is set to a negative value.

summary.span: 获取或设置组内单选按钮的显示方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which the radio buttons within the group are displayed.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定的显示方向控件。Use this property to specify the display direction of the control. > [!NOTE] > 显示的列数始终由属性。The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the property. 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Vertical`; 如果属性设置为，第一列填充从上到下，然后下一列，依此类推直到呈现出所有项。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the property is set to , the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered. 例如，如果设置为 3 的项三个列中显示控件。For example, if is set to 3, the items of the control are displayed in three columns. 一个包含 9 个项列表将如下所示。A nine-item list would appear as follows. |||| |-|-|-| |11|44|77| |22|55|88| |33|66|99| 如果此属性设置为`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`; 如果属性设置为，列表中的项显示在加载左到右的行中，然后直到呈现出所有项从上到下。If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the property is set to , the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered. 例如，如果设置为 3 的项控件显示在以下三项的行。For example, if is set to 3, the items of the control are displayed in rows of three items. 一个包含 9 个项列表将如下所示。A nine-item list would appear as follows. |||| |-|-|-| |11|22|33| |44|55|66| |77|88|99| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示的项列中的控件填充顶部到底部，，然后从左到右。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the items of a control in columns filled top to bottom, and then left to right. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.RepeatDirection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 列表的显示方向不是 值之一。

span.span: The display direction of the list is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置组内单选按钮的文本对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the text alignment for the radio buttons within the group.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定是否与单选按钮关联的文本显示在左侧或右侧显示。Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the radio buttons appears on the left or right. 如果此属性设置为`TextAlign.Right`，右侧的单选按钮的显示文本。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the radio button. 如果此属性设置为`TextAlign.Left`，左侧的单选按钮显示的文本。If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the radio button. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示与在左侧和右侧的单选按钮关联的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the text associated with the radio buttons on the left side of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic RadioButtonList.TextAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic RadioButtonList.TextAlign Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 与单选按钮关联的标签文本对齐方式不是 值之一。

span.span: The label text alignment associated with the radio buttons is not one of the values.
